questions.text:
What does this conditional evaluate to? 
 (not ((true) and (false))) and (not ((false) or (not false)))

What does this conditional evaluate to? 
 ((not false) and (not true)) and ((false) and (not true))

What does this conditional evaluate to? 
 not (((not true) and (false)) and ((true) and (false)))

What does this conditional evaluate to? 
 ((true) and (true)) or ((false) and (not true))
